summary: Over two decades of conceptually working and building unique new products, guiding business and developers and deploying enterprise critical applications across many domains•	ERP systems: AS-IS/TO-BE, Gaps and realignment of ERP processes, Integration and real-time processing of processes, technology transformation and upgrade. Complex integrations using SOA/ESB and traditional integration approach•	Education: Student Information System, Student/Faculty Self Service portal, Online Application and Integration with related Education systems. Interested in building affordable blended education technology platform•	Human Resources and Insurance: Portal system included Online Self Service for Benefits Enrollment (HR and Insurance), Back Office and IVR system for Benefits administration, Integration with Insurance systems for Involuntary and Voluntary policies •	Banking: Online Banking with Java AWT, Browser based online Banking, Banking with Quicken and Money with OFX Gateway•	Billpay and Bill Presentment: OFX Gateway (EBPP), J2EE based EBPP systems for Payments aggregation, including Portal•	Retail Payments: Retail Payments on Merchant sites, Settlement systems with Payment Processors, Online Credit application, Chargeback systems, Merchant Self Service systems, Branding and SDK’s for Merchants•	Retirement Planning: HTML based Personal Financial Advisor, Java based Personal Financial Advisor, Simulation modeling using C/C++ software, Asset allocation, Liability and Goal planning software, Income Planning software•	Cross Domain: Integrations with MQ, CICS, Sockets, HTTP services, Webservices (SOA), File/Batch Processing, LDAP, CORBA, Reporting, Document and BI systems (Multiple systems), Portals (Multiple systems), Content Management systems (Multiple), Messaging and Queuing systems, Fraud and Risk Management systems, Rule Based Systems, Data Persistence systems, Single Signon• Portal expertise in Liferay, Sakai, CAS, Spring, Alfresco, open source technologies
